title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.7 - Payrolls prepared by comptroller
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.7 - Payrolls prepared by comptroller

State Regulations

All payrolls will be prepared by machine in the Department of

Audit and Control unless special permission is given for the submission of a
payroll prepared at the agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
3.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
